import React from 'react' import cl from './addItem.module.scss' import Input from '../../../../UI/Input/Input' const InputContainer = React.forwardRef((props, ref) => { const inputStyles = { width: '180px', padding: '7px 30px 7px 5px', fontSize: '14px', } const enterKeyUp = e => (e.code === 'Enter' ? props.addNewCategory() : false) return (
) }) export default InputContainer
